outputs.name: Text
outputs.value:
[colBlue]You descend into a vast circular chamber, entirely constructed from crystal. At its center, an enigmatic figure is restrained by magical beams emanating from the walls.

[colYellow]>

outputs.name: Text
outputs.value:
[colBlue]The moment you take a step forward, the monster emits a growl of such unearthly depth that it sends shivers down your spine. Your very soul trembles with fear. Suddenly, it breaks free from the beams and conjures an orb on the wall opposite you. You realize this orb nourishes and empowers the creature and must be destroyed. At this point you hear a telepathic voice in your head:

[colPurple]The beast is greatly weakened by the energy of the beams. Destroy the orb quickly to make the it vulnerable. Beware, direct confrontation is lethal, therefore skirt the walls to safely reach your goal.

[colBlue]You glanced to your [colWhite]left[colBlue] and saw a bottomless pit, leaving your only sensible choice to head [colWhite]RIGHT[colBlue].

[colYellow]>

outputs.name: Text
outputs.value:
[colBlue]As you move forward, the beast leaps onto you, hurling you far and leaving you unconscious. Type [colWhite]RESTART[colBlue] to try again.

[colYellow]>

outputs.name: Text
outputs.value:
[colBlue]You venture into the bottomless pit, only to meet your own demise. Type [colWhite]RESTART[colBlue] to try again.

[colYellow]>

outputs.name: Text
outputs.value:
[colBlue]The aberration unleashes a colossal beam of energy. It seems extremely difficult to [colWhite]EVADE[colBlue] it. What would you like to do?

[colYellow]>

outputs.name: Text
outputs.value:
[colBlue]You attempt to shield yourself with your bare arms, but the power of the beam is overwhelming, and you cannot contain it. Type [colWhite]RESTART[colBlue] to try again.

[colYellow]>

outputs.name: Text
outputs.value:
[colBlue]You try to dodge the beam, but you can't move far enough in time. Type [colWhite]RESTART[colBlue] to try again.

[colYellow]>

outputs.name: Text
outputs.value:
[colBlue]You employ your crystal shield to deflect the attack, which proves effective, albeit leaving the shield damaged. Without respite, the creature unleashes a small yet intensely concentrated beam, appearing and sounding undeniably lethal.

[colYellow]>

outputs.name: Text
outputs.value:
[colBlue]You try to shield yourself once more, but the beam's force is overpowering, rendering your shield incapable of withstanding it. Type [colWhite]RESTART[colBlue] to try again.

[colYellow]>

outputs.name: Text
outputs.value:
[colBlue]You narrowly dodge the attack, sprinting with all your might until you finally reach the orb. The telepathic voice echoes in your head again:

[colPurple]Sublime work. Now, [colWhite]DESTROY[colPurple] the orb and vanquish the beast!

[colYellow]>

outputs.name: Text
outputs.value:
[colBlue]The creature screams in pain for a few seconds and then becomes completely quiet. It then talks directly to you:

[colPurple]I realize I cannot defeat you in this condition. Therefore, I offer you the following deal: spare me and join forces to rule the universe together. Do you accept?

[colYellow]>

outputs.name: Text
outputs.value:
[colBlue]As you agree to the deal, the creature betrays you, delivering a powerful blow before fleeing the prison. Type [colWhite]RESTART[colBlue] to try again.

[colYellow]>

outputs.name: Text
outputs.value:
[colBlue]The aberration grows increasingly enraged and lunges at you, knocking you to the ground. It prepares to deliver a devastating blow, leaving you with few options. What will you do next?

[colYellow]>

outputs.name: Text
outputs.value:
[colBlue]You attempt to evade the attack, but the beast is too close to avoid. Type [colWhite]RESTART[colBlue] to try again.

[colYellow]>

outputs.name: Text
outputs.value:
[colBlue]You attempt to punch the monster, but your effort proves futile. It seizes your hand and delivers a powerful blow, rendering you unconscious. Type [colWhite]RESTART[colBlue] to try again.

[colYellow]>

outputs.name: Text
outputs.value:
[colBlue]As the monster attempts to strike, you recall that you possess a staff. Reacting swiftly, you wield the staff to unleash a powerful magical attack that obliterates the beast in an instant. The benevolent alien then addresses you:

[colPurple]The menace has been vanquished. I sense its malevolent presence no more. You have saved the universe, hero. Now, I shall mend your wounds and transport you back to your ordinary life. However, I understand that this ordeal may be overwhelming. Hence, I offer you a choice: you may opt to have your memory erased, returning to a life of normalcy with no recollection of these events. Alternatively, you can retain your memories, but you'll carry the burden alone, as no one will believe your tale without proof. What is your decision, hero?

[colYellow]>

outputs.name: Text
outputs.value:
[colBlue]A brilliant light fills your vision, erasing all pain and thought. As you relax and close your eyes, the gentle chirping of birds filters through. Slowly awakening, you find yourself inside a cozy hut nestled within the woods. Recollection floods back: caught in a heavy rainstorm, you sought refuge in this secluded dwelling. It's time to resume your daily life and make amends for the tardiness at your awaited work meeting.
[colPurple]
 _____ _            _____           _
|_   _| |__   ___  | ____|_ __   __| |
  | | | '_ \ / _ \ |  _| | '_ \ / _` |
  | | | | | |  __/ | |___| | | | (_| |
  |_| |_| |_|\___| |_____|_| |_|\__,_|

[colBlue]Type [colWhite]RESTART[colBlue] to play again.

[colYellow]>

outputs.name: Text
outputs.value:
[colBlue]A brilliant light fills your vision, erasing all pain. As you relax and close your eyes, the gentle chirping of birds filters through. Slowly awakening, you find yourself inside a cozy hut nestled within the woods. You pause, contemplating the potential sinister occurrences unfolding amidst the vast expanse of the universe, even as people go to work, hit the gym, or grab lunch. Life, as you now perceive it, feels oddly surreal. Nonetheless, it is time to resume your daily life and make amends for the tardiness at your awaited work meeting.

[colPurple]
 _____ _            _____           _
|_   _| |__   ___  | ____|_ __   __| |
  | | | '_ \ / _ \ |  _| | '_ \ / _` |
  | | | | | |  __/ | |___| | | | (_| |
  |_| |_| |_|\___| |_____|_| |_|\__,_|

[colBlue]Type [colWhite]RESTART[colBlue] to play again.

[colYellow]>
